name: mountain hike
description:
can you climb the mountain? It's literally impossible because the game is not finished he he he... but you can look at flowers and jump on rocks!

(it's finsished now kinda so yeah. Climb the mountain, king)

featuring 1x animation(a pose), 1x epic platforming moment, 1x mountain and 1x AI generated song

the game no longer feutures 1 animation, it feutures a couple but they're not synced so it looks a bit weird but you know. that's life

"mountain-hike-win-postgamejam.zip" is the latest version

"mountain guy.blend" is the assets I made personally for blender 2.82+ (including a whole ass cat with rig that was never used)

the music was generated with computoser http://computoser.com/

(I haven't tested this build of the game yet) (I have tested the build of the game now)
